articles.content: Senior executives of telecom operators Reliance Jio and Bharti Airtel expressed their dismay over the use of unlicensed spectrum for Internet of Things (IoT) and WiFi services. They said while telcos… [+2338 chars]

articles.title: LIC plans record ₹2.4 tn investments next fiscal | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Move may bolster Indian stocks amid pullout from EMs by foreign investors
articles.content: MUMBAI : Life Insurance Corp. of India (LIC), the countrys largest investor, plans to invest a record 2.4 trillion across markets, including shares of locally traded companies, in the year starting 1… [+4195 chars]

articles.title: Risks To Financial Stability Have Increased, Warns IMF Chief - NDTV
articles.description: International Monetary Fund chief Kristalina Georgieva warned on Sunday that risks to financial stability had increased and stressed "the need for vigilance" following the recent turmoil in the banking sector.
articles.content:
IMF chief Kristalina Georgieva was speaking at an event in Beijing. (File)
